title: New scans - 64 books - Various topics (pdf)
description:
I haven't had much time lately for uploads, but here are some recent scans (and a few older ones I never posted before). Almost all are my own scans; a few are improved versions of scans found on the web. By and large these are books not easily found in digital format elsewhere.

The topics are pretty random -- fiction, literature, politics, literary criticism, philosophy, esoteric, etc., etc. If you've liked many of my previous uploads, you'll probably find something to like in this one.

Please feel free to repost anything in this torrent anywhere you think others might find it.


Title - Author:

Another Day of Life - Ryszard Kapuscinski
Applied Christianity - John J. Hugo
As Bread That Is Broken - Peter G. van Breemen
At Swim-Two-Birds - Flann O'Brien
Babi Yar - Anatoly Kuznetsov & A. Anatoli
Charlotte's Web - E. B. White
Conscience & Obedience - William Stringfellow
Consenting Adults, or The Duchess Will Be Furious - Peter de Vries
Conspiracy - Anthony Summers
Consumer, The - M. Gira
Covenant of the Heart - Valentin Tomberg
Dark Avenues and Other Stories - Ivan Bunin & Richard Hare
Death of Socrates, The - Romano Guardini
Discovering Girard - Michael Kirwan

Ecology of Freedom, The - Murray Bookchin

New Testament in Modern English, Revised Edition, The - J. B. Phillips

Note: The version of To Kill a Mockingbird in this torrent is a different and better scan than the one uploaded previously.

My apologies for not keeping up-to-date on PMs or responding to recent requests. I'll get to them as soon as I can.
